label: 簫
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: An instrument made from a row of bamboo reeds of different lengths with diagonal U-shaped notches on either side of the mouthpiece. It is played by blowing across the top. This shō should not be confused with the mouth organ, which is also called shō but is written with a different Chinese character.
